LanguageData.MoodThatFerianHitAliens.stages.0.label: 【Completely Humiliated】
LanguageData.MoodThatFerianHitAliens.stages.0.descrip: I was scolded... humiliated... \n\nEven if they used to live in a miraculous world, at least now we are... As equals...Right？...
LanguageData.MoodThatFerianConsoleAliens.stages.0.des: Although these furry aliens have done a lot of bad things... \n\nBut I firmly believe that we can be very good friends! We're having lamb chop tonight!
